We believe everyone should have access to a world-class mind sports games platform powered by Artificial Intelligence in order to both train players and ensure fair play.
We are a nonâ€‘profit association because we believe everyone should have access to a free, world-class chess platform.
We rely on support from people like you to make it possible. If you enjoy using PlayStrategy, please consider supporting us by donating and becoming a Patron!
Pay %s once. Be a PlayStrategy Patron forever!
Recurring billing, renewing your Patron wings every month.
A single donation that grants you the Patron wings for one month.

We are a small team, so your support makes a huge difference!
The celebrated Patrons who make PlayStrategy possible
There are lots of costs for running a platform like this, primarily server fees and developer salaries, so we can have new games and new features.
Yes, here\'s the act of creation (in French)
Can I change/cancel my monthly support?
Yes, at any time, from this page. Or you can %s.
Are some features reserved to Patrons?
No, because PlayStrategy is entirely free, forever, and for everyone. That\'s a promise. However, Patrons get bragging rights with a cool new profile icon.
